scripts.ptest: npx wdio run .\test\wdio.conf_parallel.ts & npx allure generate --clean .\allure-results\
scripts.test: npx wdio run .\test\wdio.conf.ts & npx allure generate --clean .\allure-results\
scripts.mtest: npx wdio run .\test\wdio.conf_mocha.ts & npx allure generate --clean .\allure-results\
scripts.mptest: npx wdio run .\test\wdio.conf_mocha_parallel.ts & npx allure generate --clean .\allure-results\
scripts.mpdtest: npx wdio run .\test\wdio.conf_parallel_devices.ts & npx allure generate --clean .\allure-results\
scripts.apptest: npx wdio run .\test\wdio.conf_mocha_appium.ts & npx allure generate --clean .\allure-results\
